name: Art Per Stick
description:
In the futuristic city called Techno-Sticks, the robots have risen against their creators and threatened to take over the world, so stickmen had to launch bombs at the robot city and bury it under the ground. Many years later it became a empting place to many brave explorers and people looking for some futuristic technologies. The robots are still under the ground, walking aimlessly until they see another victim to slaughter.

You are playing as an artificial stickman who was created by a mysterious figure using a neo-printer. They asked for favor, and so you begin your descend through the ruins of what used to be a striving city, collecting anything that may prove useful through your travels.

Warning:

This game will probably not lie up to your expactations. I'm far from a professional video game maker, I just do this for fun, as a hobby. Also, it's super early, so there's no lore yet.
